name: @project-name/db

scripts.db-generate: zenstack generate --output "./generated/zenstack" && pnpm run generate-index && pnpm run prettier
scripts.pushDB: pnpx prisma db push && pnpm run prettier
scripts.resetDB: pnpx prisma migrate reset --skip-generate --skip-seed && pnpx prisma db push
scripts.generateServices: tsx scripts/generateServiceFiles.ts && tsx scripts/generateServiceFiles.ts && tsx scripts/generateSchemaFiles.ts && tsx scripts/generateRouterFiles.ts && tsx scripts/generateApiTypeFiles.ts
scripts.build: pnpm db-generate && tsc && tsc-alias && tsx scripts/fix-build-import-path.ts
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf types && rimraf generated

author: Abdul Fourteia
description: prisma schema for main dalilshafi database
